name: Translate
description: Translates a text using a given personality

agentConfigs.description: Translates a text in a given language. Additional details can be provided as well as a personality which can be identified by it's name. It is possible to set max tokens for this request

parameters.name: personalityId
parameters.description: The id of the personality to be used.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language in which the text will be translated.
